{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Mi Casa Verde VeraLite.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = VeraLite Smart Home Controller Hub |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Mi Casa Verde |model = Vera |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Lite |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = home monitoring gateway |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = P27NA300 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = AC110-1.6 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Ralink;RT3662;RT3662F, PHR236SHO, 1222AT; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 500 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = STMicro;NAND256W3A2BN6; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Atmel;AT25128B; |flash2size = 128 KiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR |ram1type1 = DRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5TU32M16DG-AC; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8201EL; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = 00:0E:8F
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (57600 8N1),, P1 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = battery powered, Z-Wave |addchip = 2A 20V 550KHz Synchronous Step-Down DC/DC Converter;ZillTek;LV1428S;;2; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SerComm |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 12/10/2011 |estreldate = 01/2012 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16881517001 |asin = B007005364 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B0074WIVJ4 |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Zensys;ZW0301; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2stand = Z-Wave |rad2freq = <!-- 2.4 or 5 or 6, Frequency band(s) of this radio -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Ralink]]'' RT3662 [[MIPS 74Kc]] @500MHz *Storage: 32MB NAND Flash *Memory: 64MB DDR DRAM *Wi-Fi: 802.11bgn, Z-Wave *Network: 1x Fast Ethernet ports *USB: 1x USB 2.0 ports *Power Source: 5V 1A via barrel or 4x AA cell batteries
==See also== :;Vera Control • [https://z-wave.su/ru/blog/obzor-kontrollera-vera-secure Secure] *[[Mi Casa Verde Vera2]] • [[Broadcom]] BCM5354 • [[Sigma Designs]] Z-Wave *[[Mi Casa Verde Vera3]] • [[Ralink]] CPU @500MHz; Memory: 32MB/128MB <!-- :DDR2 RAM, USB ports: 2; Ethernet ports: 1 WAN, 4 LAN; Z-Wave and Wireless-N Wi-Fi (802.11n) --> *[[Mi Casa Verde Vera Edge]] • CPU @600MHz (MIPS) • Memory: 128MB/128MB *[[Mi Casa Verde VeraLite]] (G) • [[Ralink]] RT3662 • Memory: 32MB/64MB, Zensys Z-Wave *[[Mi Casa Verde Vera Plus]] • [[MediaTek]] MT7621S • Memory: 128MB/256MB, Z-Wave+, ZigBee *[[Mi Casa Verde Vera Secure]] • [[MediaTek]] MT7621A • Memory: 128MB/512MB, VeraLink <!-- Vera Edge Vera Plus Vera Secure
CPU SoC 600MHz MIPS 880MHz MIPS 880MHz Dual-Core MIPS Flash NAND 128MB NAND 128MB NAND 128MB RAM DDR2 128MB DDR3 256MB DDR3 512MB Z-wave Z-wave Plus Z-wave Plus Z-wave Plus ZigBee - HA 1.2 HA 1.2 Bluetooth - 4.0 + BLE 4.0 + BLE Wi-Fi 802.11bgn 802.11abgn/ac 802.11abgn/ac VeraLink - - 345MHz (US)/433MHz (EU) -->
[[Category:English Documentation]]
